testcase.name: Address deleteion
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://demo.spreecommerce.org' .................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * def AccessFeatureFile = call read('AccessToken.feature') ................ passed * def AccessToken = AccessFeatureFile.AccessToken ......................... passed * def AccessAddressFile = call read('GET_ListAllAddress.feature') ......... passed * def AddId = AccessAddressFile.response.data[0].id ....................... passed * print AddId ............................................................. passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ AccessToken ....................... passed When path '/api/v2/storefront/account/addresses/' + AddId ................. passed When method DELETE ........................................................ passed Then status 204 ........................................................... passed * print "Address deleted "+ response ...................................... passed
